flawed_nl_solution:
The time the singer had for singing was 80 - 10 = <<80-10=70>>70 minutes.
The time the singer had for singing 5-minute songs was 70 - 10 = 60 minutes.
The number of 5-minute songs was 60 / 5 = <<60/5=21>>21 songs.
The total number of songs sung is 21 + 1 = <<21+1=22>>22 songs.
#### 22

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
